entry.title: New release for Mergeable: v0.6.0
entry.content:
This is Mergeable v0.6.0 (beta). This release contains several important bugfixes that we recommend you apply to your installation. It also comes with an opt-out telemetry feature gathering anonymous usage statistics.

What's Changed

  • feat: add a telemetry server by @pvcnt
  • fix: disable concurrent activity execution protection by @pvcnt
  • fix: splitting queries incorrectly removed quotes by @pvcnt

Full Changelog: https://github.com/pvcnt/mergeable/compare/v0.5.0...v0.6.0

entry.title: New release for Mergeable: v0.8.0
entry.content:
This release contains a large performance improvement, leading to faster synchronization of pull requests and reducing the risk to hit GitHub's rate limits.

What's Changed

  • feat: search pulls with a single GraphQL query by @pvcnt
  • feat: save collapsed state in local storage by @pvcnt
  • feat: keyboard shortcut 'R' to refresh pulls by @pvcnt

Full Changelog: https://github.com/pvcnt/mergeable/compare/v0.7.0...v0.8.0

entry.title: New release for Mergeable: v0.9.0
entry.content:
This release contains several small usability improvements and UI updates. It also moved to a more standard (and hopefully robust) way of fetching pull requests using TanStack Query.

What's Changed

  • fix: poor contrast in dark mode for by @pvcnt
  • feat: limit number of pull requests returned per section by @pvcnt
  • feat: replace the command bar by a search box by @pvcnt
  • feat: move the refresh button in the navbar by @pvcnt
  • feat: use TanStack query to fetch pulls by @pvcnt

Full Changelog: https://github.com/pvcnt/mergeable/compare/v0.8.0...v0.9.0

entry.title: New release for Mergeable: v0.10.0
entry.content:
This release contains several usability improvements: real PR links, sortable columns, login screen. It also refactors how React Router is used by moving to the more recent framework mode.

What's Changed

  • docs: revamp docs home, add a screenshot by @pvcnt
  • refactor: use React Router in framework mode by @pvcnt
  • fix: use real links by @KaelWD
  • feat: make columns sortable by @pvcnt
  • feat: login screen when no connections are configured by @pvcnt

New Contributors

  • @KaelWD made their first contribution in https://github.com/pvcnt/mergeable/pull/178

Full Changelog: https://github.com/pvcnt/mergeable/compare/v0.9.0...v0.10.0
